Fixes (Johannes)
----------------

Replaced all calls to SetAttributeViReal64 by Configuration functions, because for one instrument these dont work



IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviDCPwr Specific Instrument Driver
Class Specification version: 2.00
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base = Supported
Measurement = Supported
Trigger = Not Supported
SoftwareTrigger = Not Supported



Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking = True
State Caching = True
Coercion Recording = True


Driver Identification:
---------------------

Driver Revision: 1.8.0.0

Driver Vendor:Thurlby Thandar Instruments

Prefix: TQLP

Description: QL Series DC Power Supply



Driver Release Information:
--------------------------

Original Release Date: 26/01/2009

v1.6 - 1/8/2011 - Added support for LAN and LXI compliance

v1.6.1 - 6/9/2012 - Fixed virtual channel name coercion

v1.7.0 - 13/8/2013 - Fixed QueryOutputState response
		     Fixed issue where range limits where not unique to each session - Causing a problem for multiple models


v1.7.1 -  September 2013 - Fixed o/p3 set volts

v1.7.3 -  April 2014 - Fixed problem in TQLP_GetRange with converting string to int

v1.8.0 -  July 2014 - Fixed TQLP_ATTR_ID_QUERY_RESPONSE in simulation mode



Hardware Information:
--------------------

Instrument Manufacturer: Thurlby Thandar Instruments / Sorensen

Supported Instrument Models: TTi QL Series - QL355TP, QL355P, QL564TP, QL564P
Supported Instrument Models: Sorensen XDL Series - XDL35-5TP, XDL35-5P, XDL56-4TP, XDL56-4P


Supported Bus Interfaces: GPIB, USB, Serial, LAN



Software Information:
--------------------

Support Software Required: IVI Compliance Package 3.3, VISA 4.4, IVI Shared Components 1.5.1

Source Code Availability: Available
